body: Right, now that my school work has been reduced, and I have more time, I am looking to make a map for the Avicus Network. I just need some advice, and someone to help me do the YML/XML for the map. If interested in assisting, please message me on Slack or Skype (marcuzfire346)

title: Looking to make a map
